EARLY BIRD OPEN

WELCOME

Welcome to ElixirConf EU.

Co-organised by ElixirConf and Code Sync.

ElixirConf EU is the premiere Elixir conference in Europe, bringing the best speakers in the community together, for two days of first-rate Elixir talks and a day of tutorials.
